QuestData.Title: Playing With Felfire
QuestData.Description: <Draaka leans down to speak to you.>$b$bListen... Before you say anything, I KNOW we're not to meddle with demonic energies....$b$bBut look around you! These are desperate times, $c.$b$bWe'll most likely die here, regardless. May as well go out in a blaze of glory, I say!$b$bSo... Are you in?$b$bTake this canister and go southeast to Felfire Hill. Use it near the patches of felfire and bring it back to me when you've filled it.$b$bOh, and best not to mention this to anyone....
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: It starts to burn if I don't fire off frequently. You know what I mean?
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: It starts to burn if I don't fire off frequently. You know what I mean?
QuestData.LogDescription: Draaka in Splintertree wants you to fill the Reinforced Canister with 7 Felfires from Felfire Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you fill up that canister for me, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, yes!$b$bThis will teach those elves, just you watch!
